entry.title: WIND WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:15 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 07:08 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure: 96.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -24.7°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
